fol.136r
Belgia. 1591 5 May To my L. Trea
s
Belgia: 1591: May
May it please yo
r
good L. There is order taken
for a
Rendez Vous
of
e forces of these countryes to
be made in certain places of
e Betow, & Velow, and
all to be assembled
e 14
th
of this moneth. I
have sent yo
r
L. heer a list of
e severall nomb
r
s
that are accorded to be drawen out of every Province.
A few daies past
e house of
westerlo
in
Brabant
adjoyning to
Herentals,
a place of some strength and
ap
taining to
e
Baron of Merode
was surprised by
e
souldiers of
Breda,
young Merode
e sonne, by
whom
e house was kept, was riden abroad or
hunting, wh
r
by they missed of his
son, Howbeit
e
place was taken by 120 souldiers who continewe in it
still & would willingly keepe yt against
e force of
e ennemy, for yt lieth very fitly w
th
a marish about it
that
e Ennemy cannot easily approche w
th
any battery
but heer is no resolution yet taken whether yt shalbee
held or abandoned, also of late their have issewed
certaine troupes of Breda to
e numb
r
of 300 horse &
have defeated
e horse company of
e
C. of Arenberg
w
ch
was 200 strong, & lay in
e Country of
Valkenborg
neer to
Aquisgrave,
bein
wherof the
souldiers had Intelligence by 2 brethren, w
ch
being
wronged by
e ennemy sought to bee revenged by
geving secret notice, both of
e meanes & of
e place
to assault th
e
unawares, besides those that were
slain, there ar brought to Breda about, 60 horses of
service, & 18 prisoners, moreover there hath bin of
late a hott encounter between
e Liegeois, and
e
mutins of
Diest,
in w
ch
were slain, 150 spaniard
& of
Liege
300, &
e rest put to flight, Heer
is very good hope, that
e quarel thus begon wi
ll be
hardly taken up, w
ch
wil come
e Ennemy ill t
o passe
considering his affaires have so many other cross
es
w
ch
as wee are informed encrease evry day b
y their
civil dissention,
having no oth
r
matter &c
May
5 1591
